# Course Practical Statistics for the Life Sciences

- Course material via [https://statomics.github.io/PSLS25/](https://statomics.github.io/PSLS25/)


## Lectures


- Goal: Statistical Literacy
- 1 Lecture block on Wednesday @ 8u30
- Lecture room 0.2. S8. Campus Sterre. 




## On campus PC tutorials

  - Three lecture blocks on Tuesday Morning / Afternoon
  - Goal: get insight in statistics by conducting data analysis 
  - Introduction to statistical software R
  - Week 2-3: Introduction to R
      - [https://dodona.be/nl/courses/5450/](https://dodona.be/nl/courses/5450/)
  - Week 4-12: PSLS exercises 
      - [https://statomics.github.io/PSLS25/](https://statomics.github.io/PSLS25/)

## Contact 

  - Theory: Lieven Clement (email: lieven.clement@ugent.be)
  - Exercises: Nele De Meester (email: nele.demeester@ugent.be)

## Non-periodical evaluation

  - Non-periodical evaluation: 5/20
  - Project work and writing conclusion sections 
  - Evaluate R skills and interpretation of output
  - Project work and submitting conclusion sections is mandatory. If you do not participate in projectwork you can get at most 7/20 for the course

## Periodical evaluation

  - Open book exam: 15/20
      - Assesses insight and logical reasoning 
      - Analysis of statistical output and results of scientific publications
      - Emphasis on interpretation rather than on calculation 
      - Exercises
